description:
In this course we will show you how we've used Facebook to generate targeted leads for our eCommerce store's email marketing list. You will be taken by the hand and given a step by step, over the shoulder view, from start to finish.

You're also going to be learning the key essentials of how to properly set up a Facebook Lead Campaign so that it can bring you targeted prospects who are interested in what you have to offer.

Here are a few items that you'll also be learning from this course:

  • How to find your ideal prospects to target.
  • How to make Facebook create your very own squeeze page for you
  • How to use Facebook's Power Editor to create your ad campaigns the right way
  • How to find out if your prospects like your product even if they don't buy

The skills you will be gaining from this course will enable you to greatly reduce your advertising cost while developing a more targeted email list for your sales funnel that can be used over and over again, for as long as you like.
title: Learn To Build A eCommerce Mailing List With Facebook
